plot outline: Noor and Jahan both are student of a college. Noor is high school topper from his district and Jahan's mother is a politician of the ruling party from that same district. Noor and Jahan both stands in the college politics as a leader from two different parties, Jahan also supports Noor's party because she felt in love with Noor. Noor win the college election and then the love story starts between them but then Amina Begum - Jahan's Mother keeps eyes on both of them and restrict Jahan that not to meet Noor. After that day Noor and Jahan decided to escape to Kolkata and they started their new life bit so many problems surrounded them.
title: Noor Jahaan
